nodes.title: Enhance ExecutePicked logs. Fixes kagkarlsson/db-scheduler#223
Add Loadster to the list of companies using db-scheduler.
Add some missing items from community insights
OnStartup items should always trigger commit.
Specific exceptions
Adds exponential backoff and max retries failure handlers
Better support for stateful recurring tasks, i.e. recurring tasks that updates the task-data after each run.

Readme configuration

Adding the ability to trigger task run manually.
Adding "priority ordering" feature to allow users specifying the order of precedence in a queue
